titles.title: Reduce and End our Deficits Using Commonsense Eliminations in the Defense Programs Act
To reduce deficits and government spending through the elimination of wasteful defense subsidies and programs.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Military Personnel.

bill.summary: 7/20/2010--Introduced. Reduce and End our Deficits Using Commonsense Eliminations in the Defense Programs Act - Prohibits funds made available to the Department of Defense (DOD) for FY2011 or thereafter from being used for: (1) procurement of C-17 aircraft; or (2) procurement or research, development, test, or evaluation of EP-X aircraft or CG(X) vessels. Directs the Secretary of Defense to consolidate the Army and Air Force Exchange Service, the Navy Exchange Command, and the Marine Corps exchange system into a single organization for the administration of the defense exchange stores system. Prohibits appropriated funds from being used to support the operation of exchange stores after such consolidation.
